All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlerteHistoriqueController
Controller for the alert history Allows filtering alerts by room and type Allows returning to the main menu or quitting the application Allows resetting the filters Displays alerts in a table Alerts are loaded from a file Alerts are filtered based on the filtering criteria
AlertePopup
Singleton that displays alerts on the screen.
AlertUtilities
Utility class for alerts Allows managing confirmation and information alerts
DataReader
 
GlobalVariables
Class containing global variables and methods that are used everywhere in the app.
GlobalVariables.pythonState
The different states a python file in the PythonExecuter class can be in.
Menu
Main class of the application Allows launching the application
MenuConfigController
 
MenuController
 
MenuCourbeController
 
PythonExecuter
Class to execute a python file and manage its state
PythonStatusUpdater
A singleton that updates the label that displays the mqtt python status.
RelancePythonController
Contrôleur pour le test de connexion Python Affiche un spinner pendant le test et un check ou une croix à la fin Ferme la fenêtre après 5 secondes
RunApp
 
ShowByDataController
 
ShowByRoomController
 
ShowSolarController
Controller to display solar data Displays current, daily, monthly, and yearly production data Displays a production graph over time
SolarDataReader
Class to read the solar data from the JSON file
TestController
Controller for the Python connection test Displays a spinner during the test and a check or cross at the end Closes the window after 5 seconds
